weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white, and fun to play in. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm made of frozen water.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.
🌨️ I often fall in winter.

weather.question: I'm hot and bright, and I live in the day. I give you warmth and help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I'm a star.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
☀️ I rise in the east and set in the west.

weather.question: I'm wet and I fall from the sky. I help flowers bloom and fill up rivers. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I arrive
💧 I am liquid
🌧️ Sometimes I come with thunder

weather.question: I am a strong wind that can cause damage, sometimes in a spiral shape. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I often have a calm center.
🏠 I can lift houses.
🚨 You'll hear a siren if I'm coming.

weather.question: I’m a blanket in the sky, sometimes white and fluffy, sometimes dark and stormy. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I'm made of tiny water droplets or ice crystals.
🐑 Sometimes I look like sheep.
⛈️ I can bring rain or snow.

weather.question: I am a sudden spark in the sky, often followed by a loud crash. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am electricity.
🌩️ I usually come with rain.
🌳 I can be dangerous near trees.

weather.question: I'm a band of colors in the sky, appearing after it rains when the sun shines. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have seven colors.
✨ I am caused by light refraction.
🔚 Some people believe there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am a long period of very little or no rain, causing plants to dry up. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ The soil will crack because it has no water.
🔥 Can increase the risk of wildfires.
🚱 Water restrictions may be put in place during one.

weather.question: I am a tropical cyclone with sustained winds of at least 74 miles per hour. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I form over warm ocean waters.
🌊 I can cause flooding and damage.
🧭 I have an eye.

weather.question: I am a type of fog that forms when warm, moist air passes over a cool surface. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I can be very thick near the coast.
🌫️ Can cause driving hazards.
🌬️ I'm caused by a difference in temperature.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not known for my speed!
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🌿 I like to eat algae.

ocean.question: I am a large sea animal that sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am the largest animal on Earth.
🎶 I communicate with others using sound.
🌬️ I breathe air, even though I live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. People often call me Nemo. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have orange and white stripes.
🏠 I live in a sea anemone.
🎬 I'm a famous movie character.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and can squirt ink when I'm scared. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🎨 I can change color to blend in.
🧠 I am very intelligent.

ocean.question: I am a huge mountain range under the sea that stretches across the entire globe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌋 I am created by tectonic plates.
⛰️ I'm the longest mountain range in the world.
🌋 Volcanic activity happens here.

ocean.question: I am a very large sea creature with a saw-like nose. What am I?

hints.text: 🪚 My nose is used to find food in the sand.
🦈 I am related to sharks and rays.
🚫 I am critically endangered.

ocean.question: I am a group of tiny sea creatures that glow in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I cause bioluminescence in the ocean.
🦠 I'm a type of plankton.
🌊 I can light up a wave at night.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean, a dark and mysterious place. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am in the Western Pacific Ocean.
🔦 Very little light reaches me.
🐟 Specialized creatures live here.

ocean.question: I am a current of warm water that flows up the East Coast of the United States. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I bring warmer temperatures to Europe.
🌡️ I influence weather patterns.
➡️ I move like a river in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a ring-shaped coral reef enclosing a lagoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🏝️ I am often found in tropical areas.
🌋 I am formed over a sinking volcano.
🐠 I provide habitat for many sea creatures.
